author: oheger
msg: Instances can now be created and configured in isolation.
BeanHelper provides a straight-forward implementation of BeanCreationContext
for interacting with the used BeanFactory.

author: oheger
msg: BeanFactory now expects a BeanCreationContext as parameter.
All information required by the createBean() method is now contained in a
BeanCreationContext object. This change of the interface caused some
adaptations on the DefaultBeanFactory and BeanHelper classes.

author: oheger
msg: This interface encapsulates all information needed for the creation of a bean.
In addition, it provides a mechanism for the creation of nested beans (e.g.
constructor arguments or nested properties) which is not tight to
BeanHelper. This is required for changing the way BeanHelper is used in

author: struberg
msg: OWB-896 add isDelegate to the BeanCacheKey
